titles.title: Providing for a conditional adjournment of the House of Representatives and a conditional recess or adjournment of the Senate.
Providing for a conditional adjournment of the House of Representatives and a conditional recess or adjournment of the Senate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
Declares that when the House adjourns on the legislative day of Friday, December 21, 2012, it stand adjourned until 2 p.m. on Thursday, December 27, 2012.
Declares that when the Senate recesses or adjourns on the legislative day of Friday, December 21, 2012, or Saturday, December 22, 2012, it stand recessed or adjourned until noon on Thursday, December 27, 2012.
